item.description:
Hello everyone,
I am putting a few dates out there for you all to ponder over and decide what works best for you...

Sundays: August 13th or 20th?
BBQ at my home in Millis, 4-7.30pm.
Bring the family, bring a friend...

More details to follow....

Please let me know via email which date works best for you. Email me directly at omcmeel07@comcast.net

Thank you so much, I look forward to seeing you all and meeting some new members.

group.name: The Boston Area Young Widow and Widowers Group

item.name: Phase 11 BBQ
